mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_material ( material_name, category_id, is_expensive, sn_code, quantity, usage_limit, status ) VALUES ( #{material_name}, #{category_id}, #{is_expensive}, #{sn_code}, #{quantity}, #{usage_limit}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT material_id, material_name, category_id, is_expensive, sn_code, quantity, usage_limit, status FROM tb_material WHERE material_id = #{id}
SELECT material_id, material_name, category_id, is_expensive, sn_code, quantity, usage_limit, status FROM tb_material WHERE material_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND status = '可用'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_material SET material_name = #{material_name}, category_id = #{category_id}, is_expensive = #{is_expensive}, sn_code = #{sn_code}, quantity = #{quantity}, usage_limit = #{usage_limit}, status = #{status} WHERE material_id = #{material_id}
